active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the ethical and practical balance between thorough directory brute-forcing (e.g., large wordlists) and stealth (e.g., rate limiting, proxies) during a penetration test. How does this align with NIST SP 800-115 guidelines and real-world bug bounty programs? Support with examples from OWASP Juice Shop labs.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Penetration Testing and Ethical Hacking. Topic: Directory Brute-forcing (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Penetration Testing And Ethical Hacking > Web Application Penetration Testing > 003_Application Mapping and Analysis > Forced Browsing and Content Discovery > Directory Brute-forcing). Consensus-approved (82.9%) with voter priorities on pedagogy, scaffolding, completeness. Incorporate: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: [INSERT FULL DETAILS FROM ABOVE] (reference in explanations where relevant). - Scaffolding: Use ONLY this 4-layer structure as content source: [INSERT FULL LAYERS FROM ABOVE]. - Big Picture: Ethical pen testing per OWASP/NIST SP 800-115; labs only (DVWA, Juice Shop); sources: OWASP Testing Guide, SecLists GitHub, Gobuster/FFUF docs. Generate 30 high-quality flashcards optimized for Anki/Quizlet: - Cover all Bloom's levels proportionally. - Follow exact schema: Each card as JSON object {front: str, type: str, back: {answer: str, explanation: str (200-400 words, pedagogical, with examples), bloom_level: str, scaffolding_layer: int, active_learning_link: str (optional)}}. - For MCQs: Front includes 4 options (A/B/C/D, randomize correct); distractors per protocol: plausible, misconception-based. - Varied types: 12 MCQ, 9 Q/A, 6 command/process, 3 create/eval scenarios. - Ensure ethical: Emphasize legal pen testing, no real attacks. - Output: JSON array of 30 cards. No additional text.
